医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
Wiley发布了更新的Maurer，Meyer，Helfer，Weber：LC-HR-MS/MS毒品库，Poisons及其代谢物数据库威利（Wiley）是世界上最大的出版商之一，也是研究与学习方面的全球领导者，今天宣布了莫雷尔（Maurer），迈耶（Meyer），梅尔（Meyer），赫尔弗（Helfer），韦伯（Weber）的第二版发布：LC-HR-MS/MS药物，Poisons库，Poisons和他们的代谢物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/wiley-reases-maurer-maurer-maurer-meyer-helfer-weber-weber-lc-hr-msms-library of-drugs-poisons-poisons-and-their-their-their-their-metabolites-metabolites-database.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/Wiley-releases-updated-Maurer-Meyer-Helfer-Weber-LC-HR-MSMS-Library-of-Drugs-Poisons-and-Their-Metabolites-database.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3E63CBDB-DC79-4D35-A618-7DC0BDB6613D Tue, 08 Apr 2025 01:06:00 -0400 Wiley releases updated Maurer, Meyer, Helfer, Weber: LC-HR-MS/MS Library of Drugs, Poisons and Their Metabolites database
研究表明，帕金森氏病的诊断变化率很高芬兰图尔库大学和图尔库大学医院的一项新研究发现，帕金森氏病的诊断很大一部分得到了纠正。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/study-reveals-high-rate-rate-of-dinnostic-changes-changes-in-parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/study-reveals-high-rate-rate-of-dinnostic-changes-changes-inparkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10BB9F39-8325-4EDB-970C-5EB5EB5EB534503404 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 22:46:00 -0400 Study reveals high rate of diagnostic changes in Parkinson’s disease
通过历史数据了解健康差异的起源在过去的一个世纪中，健康不平等已从主要受传染病，卫生条件差和危险工作条件驱动转变为受慢性疾病，生活方式因素和不平等的现代医疗保健的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/understanding-the--origins-of-health-health-disparities-through-historical-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/understanding-the--origins-of-health-health-disparities-through-historical-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d6e8ed6-4528-43c4-43c4-ad95-3ca07e7e7bf45b Mon, 07 Apr 2025 22:44:00 -0400 Understanding the origins of health disparities through historical data
与社交媒体相关的青春期饮食习惯不良昆士兰大学研究发现，青春期的饮食习惯不足 - 许多糖果，含糖饮料或跳过早餐 - 与过度使用社交媒体有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/poor-dietary-habits-habits-in-clismencm-smentmence-mass-sociated-with-social-media-overuse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/poor-dietary-habits-in--------------------------------------- social-sociate-social-media-overuse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df610E39-2C4B-4D96-8041-F44D49F49FBCB05 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 22:42:14 -0400 Poor dietary habits in adolescence associated with social media overuse
有缺陷的基因与成千上万的肺肺风险增加有关根据剑桥研究人员的新估计，多达三分之一的人可能会携带一个错误的基因，从而大大增加其肺部肺部的风险。先前的估计使这种风险接近20万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/faulty-gene-linked-to increased-to-increased-to-risk-of-punctund-unctund-in-in-in-in-in-theysss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/faulty-gene-linked-to increased-to-incred-to-incrund-unctunctund-ungunctund-ungnunctund-in-in-in-theyss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11B48055-62D5-4E6C-B572-D8CD783AEDCD Mon, 07 Apr 2025 22:36:25 -0400 Faulty gene linked to increased risk of punctured lung in thousands
新研究揭示了细胞因子如何影响情绪和行为长期以来，医师已经观察到了一种神秘现象：在感染或自身免疫性疾病爆发之后，有些人经历了长时间的情绪波动，情绪失调和行为变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-studies-reveal-how-cytokines-cytokines-aft-mood-mood-and-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-studies-reveal-how-cytokines-cytokines-affect-mood-and-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=454b7af1-381c-43f4-a2fb-fb-f1442df944e3 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 22:23:12 -0400 New studies reveal how cytokines affect mood and behavior
新的量子技术将彻底改变胃肠道癌检测和治疗新的澳大利亚技术将改变以精确，微创手术检测和治疗胃肠癌的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-quantum-technology-set-set-set-to-revolutionsize-gastrointestinal-cancer-cancer-dection-dection-and-wortment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-quantum-technology-set-set-to-revolutionsize-gastrointestinal-cancer-cancer-detection-and-wortment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08f3d199-8995-4879-ba5a-1116df170e941 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 22:17:24 -0400 New quantum technology set to revolutionize gastrointestinal cancer detection and treatment
60多岁的饮食和运动习惯与较低的骨折和心脏死亡风险有关一项对老年人的长期研究将高质量的饮食联系起来，以降低髋部骨折和心血管死亡的风险。研究人员认为，通过心脏病意识构架骨骼健康可以更好地使男性参与预防性行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/diet-and-and-cersise-habits-habits-in-your-60s-cin-------链接到lower-fower-to-lower-fortracture-fracture-fracture-fracture-and-heart-de-teart-death-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/diet-and-and-cercise-habits-habits-in-your-60s-clinked to-lower-to-lower-to-lower-forter-fracture-fracture-fracture-tracture-and-heart-heart-depht-comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e611b89c-843c-474c-474c-A616-660Dee78b8 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 22:00:00 -0400 Diet and exercise habits in your 60s linked to lower fracture and heart death risk
AI模型增强了致命细菌中抗生素耐药性的检测抗药性感染，尤其是来自致命细菌（如结核病和葡萄球菌）的感染 - 是日益增长的全球健康危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/ai-model-enhances-detection-of--antibiotic-resistance-inbacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/ai-model-enhances-detection-of--antibiotic-resistance-in-------------------------------- indeadly-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf44448e5-60af-4dd6-a2d9-c90ad5103ab6 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 21:58:47 -0400 AI model enhances detection of antibiotic resistance in deadly bacteria
人类牙科干细胞可以转化为可激发的神经元细胞，研究表明在巴斯克大学（UPV/EHU）获得的电生理活性的细胞正在为研究神经退行性疾病的研究和未来自体移植的发展开辟了新的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/human-dental-stem-cells-cells-can-be-be-be-transformed-into-exciblet-exciblet-neuronal-cells-cells-cells-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/human-dental-stem-cells-cells-can-be-be-transformed-into-into-exciblet-neuronal-cells-cells-cells-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e25bd8bd-a1a7-42be-90d5-a95f7cd8e79f Mon, 07 Apr 2025 21:50:00 -0400 Human dental stem cells can be transformed into excitable neuronal cells, study shows
